sub_sections.text1: CO (Carbon monoxide control is essential design requirement l in covered car parks. Under designed ventilation system, parking facility turns out IAQ problems. Exposure of CO leads various type of health issues even death in extreme case. So it is a necessary design need of proper ventilated system,  CFD analysis will be ensuring that the ventilation system meets the NBC, ASHRAE and WHO guidelines for CO exposure and contaminant control. The working of staircase pressurization, zone modelling with or without using directional jet fan for CO removal can also be analysed. The acceptance contaminant level criterion for parking garages is recommended in ASHRAE 2007 Handbook.
Service: ventilation design, axial fan sizing and estimation jet fan number, optimization of location .

sub_sections.title: INDUSTRIAL SYATEM
sub_sections.text1: An efficient industrial environment keeping the aspects process requirement along with human comfort is a challenging. Which is outcome as an under designed and over designed system to overcome process requirement. In both case system need to compromise either any one of them, always human comfort is compensated. Overall productivity is reduced.Pharmaceutical, food and textile industry need a specific temperature and humidity control, for such industry maintaining human comfort is most challenging which results in faulty HVAC equipment and inefficient system.
CFD analysis can evaluate the air distribution pattern specially concerned zone and meet the process requirement along efficiently with human comfort criteria.
An example of CFD analysis for the industrial ventilation system, Proper air distribution, induced and more ACPH design at specific zone
Temperature around 24 deg c. – RH about 55%
